short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FireScope provides real-time monitoring and visualization of Firestore requests in Chrome DevTools with clear, collapsible JSON.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FireScope provides real-time monitoring and visualization of Firestore requests directly in Chrome DevTools. Debug your Firestore queries with beautifully formatted request bodies and clear, collapsible JSON visualization
